features: PRIMARY USES AND APPLICATIONS - This Coax cable is used for connecting a cable television, satellite receiver, cable modems, VCR, cable box, digital router, antenna, computer network connections, digital audio, converter box and for other audio and visual purposes.
IN-WALL USE – Ultra Clarity Cables CL3 cable are in wall rated for fire safety codes. Multi-purpose wire used for security systems, speaker wire, intercom systems, nurse call buttons, and more.
SUITABLE ANYWHERE - Triple Shielded RG6 coaxial cable perfect for outdoor or indoor use. These Triple Shielded CL3 cable offers protection from electric shock which is made to carry more voltage.

GOLD PLATED CONNECTOR - The coaxial cord is gold plated which minimizes interference and provides a reliable smooth surface that connects perfectly with the mated surface, plus this cable is corrosion resistant.
HIGH QUALITY CONNECTOR - Durable coaxial cable connector that will not pull off, break, lose signal or come loose.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ensure a quality connection between your cable box, satellite, antenna, HDTV and more with this Triple Shielded Connector from Ultra Clarity Cables. The coaxial cable is gold-plated which minimizes interference, providing a reliable smooth surface that connects perfectly with the mated surface.

Designed for Dependability The gold-plated connector is corrosion-resistant and won't oxidize over time. Ready to install and use, this plug-and-play cable will not pull off, break, lose signal or come loose, and will fulfill your audio and visual needs for years to come. 3 Layers of Shielding Enjoy a crisp signal without electromagnetic or radio frequency interference. Our triple-shielded cable can carry more voltage while preventing electric shocks.

Based in the Big Apple Ultra Clarity Cables has been proudly fulfilling our customers' cable needs since 2013. We are proud to call New York City our home! Perfect for Indoor and Outdoor Use These Triple Shielded CL3 cable offers protection from electric shock which is made to carry more voltage.

Is the coaxial cable only designed for indoor use? No. Our coaxial cable is weatherproof and safe for both indoor and outdoor use. It is built with UV resistant PVC jacket, anti-corrosive gold-plated connectors and it functions in a wide range of temperatures. What are the lengths of UCC coaxial cables? The lengths of coaxial cables range from 3-50 ft to meet your requirements. Besides, our brand also sells HDMI cables, flat HDMI cables, HDMI extension cables, braided HDMI cables, Cat6 and Cat8 ethernet cables of all sizes. What do I use UCC coaxial cable with? Our coaxial cable works with any devices with RG-6 F-type coaxial port, such as cable boxes, televisions, digital routers, cable modems, off-air antennas, satellite receivers. Does this cable have a solid copper core or just copper clad steel? Our coaxial cable is gold-plated over aluminum, and it can minimize electromagnetic interference and radio frequency interference. Besides, the aluminum is corrosion-resistant and will not oxidize. Is the cable durable? The cable is made with the finest material and they are tripled shielded. It is also CL3 rated for in-wall use and fire resistant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Coaxial Cable That Rescued My Internet Woes!
reviews.reviewText: Allow me to share my revelation about the Ultra Clarity Cables Coaxial Cable—a game-changer that resolved my Internet woes and quickly earned its five-star status.First off, let me admit a moment of feeling a bit clueless. It turns out that the key to fixing my persistent Internet issues was a simple upgrade to a better-quality coaxial cable. The old one my ISP provided was practically begging for packet loss with just a gentle touch. Once I made the switch to Ultra Clarity, the difference was palpable.The build quality of this cable is noteworthy, especially for longer runs with a bend against the wall required to reach its destination. It handled the job with finesse, ensuring a reliable connection without compromising performance.Speaking of performance, the Ultra Clarity Coaxial Cable delivers a cleaner signal, a crucial factor for someone like me with a Gigabit Internet connection. In the quest for every bit of speed and stability, this cable has proven itself to be a reliable ally.Another highlight is its resilience to slight movement—no more worrying about disruptions with the slightest touch. That peace of mind is invaluable, especially when you depend on a stable connection.In conclusion, I wholeheartedly recommend the Ultra Clarity Cables Coaxial Cable to anyone in need of a replacement. Whether it's for Internet, TV, or any other purpose, this cable delivers on its promises. A must-have for those who value a dependable and high-performance coaxial cable!
